item.title: Eugene's Coding Blog | Diversity is NOT a progressive value. Its a rational one.
item.description: Diversity is portrayed as a progressive value, as if it is something that requires good intentions to be promoted. It is not. A lack of it, however, is merely stupid and short-sighted.
item.content:encoded: Diversity is NOT a progressive value. Its a rational one. ...
item.author: ghanizadeh.eugene@gmail.com (Eugene Ghanizadeh)

item.title: Eugene's Coding Blog | Rate Limiting An Express App
item.description: How to conduct a per-user rate limit on an Express-powered API? Well there is a naive solution, and there is a more elegant one which requires thinking in streams and reactive programming.
item.author: ghanizadeh.eugene@gmail.com (Eugene Ghanizadeh)

item.title: Eugene's Coding Blog | Error Handling in RxJS
item.description: A deep-dive in error-handling in RxJS, its solutions, pitfalls, etc.
item.author: ghanizadeh.eugene@gmail.com (Eugene Ghanizadeh)

item.title: Eugene's Coding Blog | How RxJS groupBy() Works
item.description: RxJS groupBy() operator is a useful but nuanced tool. In last post we used it to easily and descriptively rate-limit an API, here we will dig more into its specification in the context of same example.
item.author: ghanizadeh.eugene@gmail.com (Eugene Ghanizadeh)
